Name: Supplicant
Description: A confused person that thinks their entire life purpose is to die in the service of their undead masters. As a result of this unflappable determination to be ritually killed (dying in battle is just to mainstream these days, I guess), they have not been trained in any combat techniques.

Attacks.Attack Description: A feeble, half-hearted attempt at an attack. More of an insult than a proper attack, to be frank.
